imdb.plot outline: "Singing praise to sun and weapons" is a documentary in ten parts exploring Care and contemporary human condition through words and visual emotions. It does so by meeting twelve internationally renowned philosophers, listening to them in a private setting and then looking at life outside and farther on, at the natural world it comes across, thus arousing a radical, daring exchange, between words and images. This composite treatment is born especially from the willing of recreating a real and concrete dimension of the contemporary world in order to offer appropriate credibility and effectiveness. As when, in the best and worst moments, the sun and weapons strike unexpectedly so the television series narrates through photos and music, by powerful unexpected blows, and converts its title in a positive way together listening, word that becomes the only effective weapon.
imdb.title: Singing Praise to Sun and Weapons
akas: Singing Praise to Sun and Weapons (Italy)
plot: "Singing praise to sun and weapons" is a documentary in ten parts exploring Care and contemporary human condition through words and visual emotions. It does so by meeting twelve internationally renowned philosophers, listening to them in a private setting and then looking at life outside and farther on, at the natural world it comes across, thus arousing a radical, daring exchange, between words and images. This composite treatment is born especially from the willing of recreating a real and concrete dimension of the contemporary world in order to offer appropriate credibility and effectiveness. As when, in the best and worst moments, the sun and weapons strike unexpectedly so the television series narrates through photos and music, by powerful unexpected blows, and converts its title in a positive way together listening, word that becomes the only effective weapon.::Vito Amodio
